# Draft:Remember (software)

}}
Remember () is a South Korean business card management mobile application developed by Drama & Company, first released in 2014. The app enables users to scan physical business cards into digital contacts through a combination of OCR and human-assisted transcription, offering high accuracy.
In February 2025, Remember announced renewed efforts to expand its AI-based contact recommendations and enterprise services. Remember reached a milestone of five million users by early 2025
The Japanese version of Remember surpassed one million subscribers by February 2022.
